title: Low boots/zh-CN
data:
**NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！**  
[了解如何帮助我们完善Wiki](/wiki/NetHackWiki:How_to_help/zh-CN "NetHackWiki:How to help/zh-CN")

**[English](/wiki/Low_boots "Low boots")** • [中文（中国大陆）‎]()

| \[   低跟鞋   [![Low boots.png](/images/0/03/Low_boots.png)](/wiki/File:Low_boots.png) |                                                                                                                 |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 外观                                                                                  | 步行鞋                                                                                                             |
|                                                                                     |                                                                                                                 |
| 装备槽位                                                                                | [靴子](/wiki/%E9%9D%B4%E5%AD%90 "靴子")                                                                             |
| AC                                                                                  | [1](/index.php?title=%E6%8A%A4%E7%94%B2%E7%AD%89%E7%BA%A7\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "护甲等级 (page does not exist)") |
| 特殊效果                                                                                | *（无）*                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                     |                                                                                                                 |
| 基础价                                                                                 | 8 [zm](/wiki/%E9%87%91%E5%B8%81 "金币")                                                                           |
| 重量                                                                                  | [10](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8D%E9%87%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "重量 (page does not exist)")                    |
| 材料                                                                                  | [皮革](/index.php?title=%E7%9A%AE%E9%9D%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "皮革 (page does not exist)")                    |

**低跟鞋**（low boots）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[靴子](/wiki/%E9%9D%B4%E5%AD%90 "靴子")类[防具](/wiki/%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7 "防具")。它由[皮革](/index.php?title=%E7%9A%AE%E9%9D%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "皮革 (page does not exist)")制成，未[鉴定](/index.php?title=%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "鉴定 (page does not exist)")时外观为**步行鞋**（walking shoes）。

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 生成](#.E7.94.9F.E6.88.90)

- [2 描述](#.E6.8F.8F.E8.BF.B0)

- [3 策略](#.E7.AD.96.E7.95.A5)

- [4 历史](#.E5.8E.86.E5.8F.B2)

- [5 Variants](#Variants)

  - [5.1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
  - [5.2 dNetHack](#dNetHack)
  - [5.3 xNetHack](#xNetHack)
  - [5.4 SpliceHack](#SpliceHack)
  - [5.5 EvilHack](#EvilHack)
  - [5.6 SlashTHEM](#SlashTHEM)
  - [5.7 Hack'EM](#Hack.27EM)

- [6 引用及注释](#.E5.BC.95.E7.94.A8.E5.8F.8A.E6.B3.A8.E9.87.8A)

## 生成

对[鳄鱼](/index.php?title=%E9%B3%84%E9%B1%BC\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "鳄鱼 (page does not exist)")的[尸体](/wiki/%E5%B0%B8%E4%BD%93 "尸体")使用[变形](/index.php?title=%E5%8F%98%E5%BD%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "变形 (page does not exist)")会将其转化为一双防火的+0低跟鞋[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。

[雇佣兵](/index.php?title=%E9%9B%87%E4%BD%A3%E5%85%B5\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "雇佣兵 (page does not exist)")类怪物生成时有2⁄3的概率[携带](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")一双低跟鞋[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。

[任务守卫](/index.php?title=%E4%BB%BB%E5%8A%A1%E5%AE%88%E5%8D%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "任务守卫 (page does not exist)")在生成时也有可能获得低跟鞋：

- [学者](/index.php?title=%E5%AD%A6%E8%80%85\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "学者 (page does not exist)")、[护理者](/index.php?title=%E6%8A%A4%E7%90%86%E8%80%85\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "护理者 (page does not exist)")、[方丈](/index.php?title=%E6%96%B9%E4%B8%88\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "方丈 (page does not exist)")、[侍祭](/index.php?title=%E4%BE%8D%E7%A5%AD\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "侍祭 (page does not exist)")、[导游](/index.php?title=%E5%AF%BC%E6%B8%B8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "导游 (page does not exist)")和[魔法学徒](/index.php?title=%E9%AD%94%E6%B3%95%E5%AD%A6%E5%BE%92\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "魔法学徒 (page does not exist)")生成时有2⁄3的概率获得低跟鞋[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)。
- [酋长](/index.php?title=%E9%85%8B%E9%95%BF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "酋长 (page does not exist)")、[实习骑士](/index.php?title=%E5%AE%9E%E4%B9%A0%E9%AA%91%E5%A3%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "实习骑士 (page does not exist)")、[禅师](/index.php?title=%E7%A6%85%E5%B8%88\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "禅师 (page does not exist)")和[战士](/index.php?title=%E6%88%98%E5%A3%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "战士 (page does not exist)")生成时有1⁄4的概率获得低跟鞋[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)。

在[星界位面](/index.php?title=%E6%98%9F%E7%95%8C%E4%BD%8D%E9%9D%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "星界位面 (page does not exist)")生成的[玩家怪物](/index.php?title=%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "玩家怪物 (page does not exist)")有约16.7%的概率在生成时携带低跟鞋[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)[\[6\]](#cite_note-6)。

*以下内容涉及即将到来的版本（[NetHack 3.7.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.7.0 "NetHack 3.7.0")）之信息。如果该版本已发布，请验证此处信息是否准确，并作出相应修改，以将其并入页面。*

根据[commit 20cbadc](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/commit/20cbadcf85544cf9d0c3f4e4200b2800bab49c8e)，现在[双花](/index.php?title=%E5%8F%8C%E8%8A%B1\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "双花 (page does not exist)")在生成时会获得一双+3低跟鞋。

## 描述

低跟鞋的基础[AC](/index.php?title=AC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "AC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")加成为1。它是游戏中最轻的靴子。

低跟鞋有2⁄5的概率防止穿戴者的腿被[玄蚊](/index.php?title=%E7%8E%84%E8%9A%8A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "玄蚊 (page does not exist)")叮[伤](/index.php?title=%E8%85%BF%E4%BC%A4\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "腿伤 (page does not exist)")[\[7\]](#cite_note-7)。

## 策略

低跟鞋可以提供最低限度的防御力加成，同时也可保护你的腿不受玄蚊袭击（虽然概率不高）以及避免在[笨拙](/index.php?title=%E7%AC%A8%E6%8B%99\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "笨拙 (page does not exist)")状态下踩到[鸡蛇](/index.php?title=%E9%B8%A1%E8%9B%87\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "鸡蛇 (page does not exist)")尸体时被石化。有时低跟鞋比[铁鞋](/wiki/%E9%93%81%E9%9E%8B "铁鞋")更好，因为低跟鞋更轻，而且更不容易受到侵蚀损伤。

一般来说，低跟鞋会被[高筒靴](/wiki/%E9%AB%98%E7%AD%92%E9%9D%B4 "高筒靴")或者[魔法靴子](/index.php?title=%E9%AD%94%E6%B3%95%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "魔法物品 (page does not exist)")取代。

## 历史

低跟鞋最初于[NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0")加入游戏。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Low_boots/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), [Undead Slayers](/wiki/Undead_Slayer "Undead Slayer") have a 1⁄4 chance of starting with +1 low boots.

[Applying](/wiki/Apply "Apply") a [fishing pole](/wiki/Fishing_pole "Fishing pole") on a [moat](/wiki/Moat "Moat") square has a chance of hooking an uncursed +0 pair of low boots - this can only occur once per square.

[Upgrading](/wiki/Upgrading "Upgrading") low boots will turn them into high boots, and vice versa.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack"), low boots provide 1 base [DR](/wiki/DR "DR") and 0 base AC while worn.

### xNetHack

In [xNetHack](/wiki/XNetHack "XNetHack"), [Tourists](/wiki/Tourist "Tourist") start with a pair of low boots.

### SpliceHack

In [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack"), a pair of low boots can be combined with a [ring of levitation](/wiki/Ring_of_levitation "Ring of levitation") at a [furnace](/wiki/Furnace "Furnace") to create a pair of [levitation boots](/wiki/Levitation_boots "Levitation boots").

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), [giant](/wiki/Giant_\(starting_race\) "Giant (starting race)") [Wizards](/wiki/Wizard "Wizard") and [Infidels](/wiki/Infidel "Infidel") are given low boots in place of the role's standard body armor (which they are too big to wear). [Cultists](/wiki/Cultist "Cultist") have a 2⁄3 chance of generating with low boots.

Various lower-level player monsters and other [racial monsters](/wiki/Racial_monster "Racial monster") that are not centaurs may generate with low boots; [drow](/wiki/Drow "Drow") are given [dark elven boots](/wiki/Dark_elven_boots "Dark elven boots") in place of low boots.

### SlashTHEM

In [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), in addition to SLASH'EM details, [Ninja](/wiki/Ninja_\(role\) "Ninja (role)") and [Warriors](/wiki/Warrior "Warrior") start the game with +0 low boots. [Gnomish](/wiki/Gnome_\(starting_race\) "Gnome (starting race)") characters will have any starting low boots replaced with [gnomish boots](/wiki/Gnomish_boots "Gnomish boots").

### Hack'EM

In [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), giant characters that play as Undead Slayers have their starting [chain mail](/wiki/Chain_mail "Chain mail") replaced with low boots.

Most details from SLASH'EM and EvilHack apply, with the exception that high boots cannot be "upgraded" back into low boots.

## 引用及注释

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [src/zap.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 1528](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/zap.c#L1528)
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 642](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/makemon.c#L642)
3. [↑](#cite_ref-3) [src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 284](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/makemon.c#L284)
4. [↑](#cite_ref-4) [src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 294](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/makemon.c#L294)
5. [↑](#cite_ref-5) [src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 134](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mplayer.c#L134)
6. [↑](#cite_ref-6) [src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 294](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mplayer.c#L294)
7. [↑](#cite_ref-7) [src/mhitu.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 1219](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mhitu.c#L1219)

[![此条目的内容已同步至NetHack 3.6.7。详细信息请点击此处。](/images/f/f7/Nh367-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "此条目的内容已同步至NetHack 3.6.7。详细信息请点击此处。")
html:
Low boots/zh-CN

From NetHackWiki
< Low boots
Jump to navigation Jump to search

NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！
了解如何帮助我们完善Wiki

English

 • 中文（中国大陆）‎
[   低跟鞋  
外观 步行鞋
装备槽位 靴子
AC 1
特殊效果

（无）

基础价 8 zm
重量 10
材料 皮革

低跟鞋（low boots）是NetHack中的一种靴子类防具。它由皮革制成，未鉴定时外观为步行鞋（walking shoes）。

Contents

  • 1 生成
  • 2 描述
  • 3 策略
  • 4 历史
  • 5 Variants
    • 5.1 SLASH'EM
    • 5.2 dNetHack
    • 5.3 xNetHack
    • 5.4 SpliceHack
    • 5.5 EvilHack
    • 5.6 SlashTHEM
    • 5.7 Hack'EM
  • 6 引用及注释

生成

对鳄鱼的尸体使用变形会将其转化为一双防火的+0低跟鞋[1]。

雇佣兵类怪物生成时有2⁄3的概率携带一双低跟鞋[2]。

任务守卫在生成时也有可能获得低跟鞋：

  • 学者、护理者、方丈、侍祭、导游和魔法学徒生成时有2⁄3的概率获得低跟鞋[3]。
  • 酋长、实习骑士、禅师和战士生成时有1⁄4的概率获得低跟鞋[4]。

在星界位面生成的玩家怪物有约16.7%的概率在生成时携带低跟鞋[5][6]。

以下内容涉及即将到来的版本（NetHack 3.7.0）之信息。如果该版本已发布，请验证此处信息是否准确，并作出相应修改，以将其并入页面。

根据commit 20cbadc，现在双花在生成时会获得一双+3低跟鞋。

描述

低跟鞋的基础AC加成为1。它是游戏中最轻的靴子。

低跟鞋有2⁄5的概率防止穿戴者的腿被玄蚊叮伤[7]。

策略

低跟鞋可以提供最低限度的防御力加成，同时也可保护你的腿不受玄蚊袭击（虽然概率不高）以及避免在笨拙状态下踩到鸡蛇尸体时被石化。有时低跟鞋比铁鞋更好，因为低跟鞋更轻，而且更不容易受到侵蚀损伤。

一般来说，低跟鞋会被高筒靴或者魔法靴子取代。

历史

低跟鞋最初于NetHack 3.0.0加入游戏。

Variants

此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。
您可以帮助我们翻译此页面，但请勿使用机器翻译。

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, Undead Slayers have a 1⁄4 chance of starting with +1 low boots.

Applying a fishing pole on a moat square has a chance of hooking an uncursed +0 pair of low boots - this can only occur once per square.

Upgrading low boots will turn them into high boots, and vice versa.

dNetHack

In dNetHack and notdNetHack, low boots provide 1 base DR and 0 base AC while worn.

xNetHack

In xNetHack, Tourists start with a pair of low boots.

SpliceHack

In SpliceHack, a pair of low boots can be combined with a ring of levitation at a furnace to create a pair of levitation boots.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, giant Wizards and Infidels are given low boots in place of the role's standard body armor (which they are too big to wear). Cultists have a 2⁄3 chance of generating with low boots.

Various lower-level player monsters and other racial monsters that are not centaurs may generate with low boots; drow are given dark elven boots in place of low boots.

SlashTHEM

In SlashTHEM, in addition to SLASH'EM details, Ninja and Warriors start the game with +0 low boots. Gnomish characters will have any starting low boots replaced with gnomish boots.

Hack'EM

In Hack'EM, giant characters that play as Undead Slayers have their starting chain mail replaced with low boots.

Most details from SLASH'EM and EvilHack apply, with the exception that high boots cannot be "upgraded" back into low boots.

引用及注释

  1. ↑ src/zap.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 1528
  2. ↑ src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 642
  3. ↑ src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 284
  4. ↑ src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 294
  5. ↑ src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 134
  6. ↑ src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 294
  7. ↑ src/mhitu.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 1219

{{needhelp/zh-CN}}
{{languages}}
{{armor/zh-CN
  |color=leather color
  |name=低跟鞋
  |appearance=步行鞋
  |cost=8
  |slot=靴子
  |ac=1
  |weight=10
  |material=皮革
}}
'''低跟鞋'''（low boots）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种[[靴子]]类[[防具]]。它由[[皮革]]制成，未[[鉴定]]时外观为'''步行鞋'''（walking shoes）。

== 生成 ==
对[[鳄鱼]]的[[尸体]]使用[[变形]]会将其转化为一双防火的+0低跟鞋{{refsrc|src/zap.c|1528|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。

[[雇佣兵]]类怪物生成时有{{frac|2|3}}的概率[[怪物起始物品|携带]]一双低跟鞋{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|642|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。

[[任务守卫]]在生成时也有可能获得低跟鞋：

* [[学者]]、[[护理者]]、[[方丈]]、[[侍祭]]、[[导游]]和[[魔法学徒]]生成时有{{frac|2|3}}的概率获得低跟鞋{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|284|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。
* [[酋长]]、[[实习骑士]]、[[禅师]]和[[战士]]生成时有{{frac|4}}的概率获得低跟鞋{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|294|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。

在[[星界位面]]生成的[[玩家怪物]]有约16.7%的概率在生成时携带低跟鞋{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|134|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|294|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。

{{upcoming/zh-CN|NetHack 3.7.0|根据{{commit|20cbadcf85544cf9d0c3f4e4200b2800bab49c8e|commit 20cbadc}}，现在[[双花]]在生成时会获得一双+3低跟鞋。}}

== 描述 ==
低跟鞋的基础{{cnlink|AC}}加成为1。它是游戏中最轻的靴子。

低跟鞋有{{frac|2|5}}的概率防止穿戴者的腿被[[玄蚊]]叮[[腿伤|伤]]{{refsrc|src/mhitu.c|1219|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。

== 策略 ==
低跟鞋可以提供最低限度的防御力加成，同时也可保护你的腿不受玄蚊袭击（虽然概率不高）以及避免在[[笨拙]]状态下踩到[[鸡蛇]]尸体时被石化。有时低跟鞋比[[铁鞋]]更好，因为低跟鞋更轻，而且更不容易受到侵蚀损伤。

一般来说，低跟鞋会被[[高筒靴]]或者[[魔法物品|魔法靴子]]取代。

== 历史 ==
低跟鞋最初于[[NetHack 3.0.0]]加入游戏。

==Variants==
{{translation/zh-CN|n}}
===SLASH'EM===
In [[SLASH'EM]], [[Undead Slayer]]s have a {{frac|4}} chance of starting with +1 low boots.

[[Apply]]ing a [[fishing pole]] on a [[moat]] square has a chance of hooking an uncursed +0 pair of low boots - this can only occur once per square.

[[Upgrading]] low boots will turn them into high boots, and vice versa.

===dNetHack===
In [[dNetHack]] and [[notdNetHack]], low boots provide 1 base [[DR]] and 0 base AC while worn.

===xNetHack===
In [[xNetHack]], [[Tourist]]s start with a pair of low boots.

===SpliceHack===
In [[SpliceHack]], a pair of low boots can be combined with a [[ring of levitation]] at a [[furnace]] to create a pair of [[levitation boots]].

===EvilHack===
In [[EvilHack]], [[Giant (starting race)|giant]] [[Wizard]]s and [[Infidel]]s are given low boots in place of the role's standard body armor (which they are too big to wear). [[Cultist]]s have a {{frac|2|3}} chance of generating with low boots.

Various lower-level player monsters and other [[racial monster]]s that are not centaurs may generate with low boots; [[drow]] are given [[dark elven boots]] in place of low boots.

===SlashTHEM===
In [[SlashTHEM]], in addition to SLASH'EM details, [[Ninja (role)|Ninja]] and [[Warrior]]s start the game with +0 low boots. [[Gnome (starting race)|Gnomish]] characters will have any starting low boots replaced with [[gnomish boots]].

===Hack'EM===
In [[Hack'EM]], giant characters that play as Undead Slayers have their starting [[chain mail]] replaced with low boots.

Most details from SLASH'EM and EvilHack apply, with the exception that high boots cannot be "upgraded" back into low boots.
